Comment 4: 
FYI, with enough swap I could do full make.bash on ARMv5 system with 256MB of ram.
(I haven't tested the most recent tip version, but at least the revision one month ago
is ok)

Does 5g/5l require more memory in recent revisions?

PS: if you can compile your own kernel, you could try to use compcache (or zram in recent
kernels) to host (at least part of) swap to avoid overly wearing your flash.
